title: 114_hr2391
content: The Act titled "Medicaid Generic Drug Price Fairness Act of 2015" applies the Medicaid additional rebate requirement to generic drugs. The Medicaid Generic Drug Price Fairness Act of 2015 applies an additional rebate requirement to generic drugs under Section 1927(c)(3) of the Social Security Act. The Medicaid Generic Drug Price Fairness Act of 2015 imposes an additional rebate for generic drugs, increasing the rebate amount for certain covered outpatient drugs. The Medicaid Generic Drug Price Fairness Act of 2015 imposes an additional rebate for generic drugs, increasing the rebate amount for certain covered outpatient drugs.
